{"allmsg":{"extension_name":"HP Client Security Manager","extension_description":"Provides secure and convenient logon to Web sites","cmd_addlogin":"Add to Password Manager","cmd_openpm":"Open Password Manager","cmd_settings":"Icon Settings","cmd_help":"Help","cmd_fillin":"Fill in logon data","cmd_editprofile":"Edit logon","cmd_addprofile":"Add logon","cmd_chgpsw":"Change Password...","dpmaxs_txt_title":"HP Client Security","dpmaxs_txt_bodyadd":"Would you like Password Manager to remember the password for {account} on {domain}?","dpmaxs_txt_bodyupd":"Would you like Password Manager to update the password for {account} on {domain}?","dpmaxs_txt_ok":"Remember","dpmaxs_txt_no":"No, thanks","dpmaxs_txt_ne":"Never for this site","dpmaxs_txt_popup_msg":"
The HP Client Security Manager Chrome extension is not working properly.
For the extension to function properly, check:
1. HP Client Security Manager is installed.
2. The HP Client Security Manager plugin is enabled.
Check browser troubleshooting page in the HP Client Security Manager dashboard.

dpmaxs_txt_bodyadd.message: Would you like Password Manager to remember the password for {account} on {domain}?

dpmaxs_txt_bodyupd.message: Would you like Password Manager to update the password for {account} on {domain}?

dpmaxs_txt_popup_actOpen.message: פתח את HP Client Security Manager User Console Browser Integration Page לקבלת הוראות נוספות.

dpmaxs_txt_popup_actRemove.message: יש להפעיל גרסה אחת בלבד של HP Client Security Manager. יש להשבית או לבטל התקנה של כל גרסה אחרת שמותקנת.

dpmaxs_txt_popup_infoActivate.message: ההרחבה של HP Client Security Manager אינה פועלת משום שיישום ה-Plug-in של HP Client Security Manager אינו מופעל.

dpmaxs_txt_popup_infoMultiple.message: ההרחבה של HP Client Security Manager אינה פועלת משום שמותקנות גרסאות מרובות של הרחבת HP Client Security Manager.

dpmaxs_txt_popup_infoWrongVer.message: ההרחבה של HP Client Security Manager אינה פועלת משום שהגרסה המותקנת של הרחבת HP Client Security Manager אינה תואמת ליישום ה-Plug-in של HP Client Security Manager.

dpmaxs_txt_popup_msg.message:
The HP Client Security Manager Chrome extension is not working properly.
For the extension to function properly, check:
1. HP Client Security Manager is installed.
2. The HP Client Security Manager plugin is enabled.
Check browser troubleshooting page in the HP Client Security Manager dashboard.

dpmaxs_txt_popup_state.message: ההרחבה של HP Client Security Manager אינה פועלת כראוי.

extension_description.message: Provides secure and convenient logon to Web sites
